src:
Story behind the photo: Lights out
06 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
Diwali is officially over as lights come down all over the city The picture was clicked by reader Narayana RaoIf you have a picture and a story to share, send us the picture with your name and number at mybangaloremirror@timesgroup.com
